CustomField.description: Check this box to allow the user to create a new object of this kind and subtype. If this configuration contains a subtype, that subtype is automatically set. The relationship lookup is automatically put in, as well.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box to allow the user to create a new object of this kind and subtype. If this configuration contains a subtype, that subtype is automatically set. The relationship lookup is automatically put in, as well.
CustomField.label: Show Object in Dropdown Menu
